ComicInfo.Summary: In the snow-swept wilds of Norway, a diverse team of specialists on the Global Frequency has assembled a command post. An entire town has lost its mind, and Miranda Zero intends on helping them find it. There's something strange in the air, something unfamiliar and unexplainable, something...magical.
ComicInfo.Title: Big Sky
ComicInfo.Penciller: Jon J Muth,Warren Ellis,Jon J. Muth
ComicInfo.Inker: Jon J Muth,Warren Ellis,Jon J. Muth
